00018 // constructor for the root item
00019 LibraryItem::LibraryItem(const QString& name, QObject* parent):
00020 QObject(parent),
00021 name_(name), 
00022 level_(LibraryItem::ROOT),
00023 childItems_(),
00024 parentItem_(0),
00025 vlnv_(NULL),
00026 isValid_(true) {
00027 }
00028 
00029 // The constructor
00030 LibraryItem::LibraryItem(VLNV* vlnv, Level level, LibraryItem *parent): 
00031 QObject(parent), 
00032 name_(), 
00033 level_(level),
00034 childItems_(), 
00035 parentItem_(parent),
00036 vlnv_(NULL),  
00037 isValid_(vlnv->documentIsValid()) {
00038 
00039         QString childName;
00040 
00041         // choose name for the item in the tree
00042         switch (level) {
00043         case TYPE:
00044                 name_ = VLNV::type2Print(vlnv->getType());
00045                 childName = vlnv->getVendor();
00046                 break;
00047         case VENDOR:
00048                 name_ = vlnv->getVendor();
00049                 childName =vlnv->getLibrary();
00050                 break;
00051         case LIBRARY:
00052                 name_ = vlnv->getLibrary();
00053                 childName = vlnv->getName();
00054                 break;
00055         case NAME:
00056                 name_ = vlnv->getName();
00057                 childName = vlnv->getVersion();
00058                 break;
00059         case VERSION:
00060                 name_ = vlnv->getVersion();
00061                 vlnv_ = vlnv;
00062                 break;
00063                 // invalid level
00064         default:
00065                 return;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // if the vlnv_ is null then the item has child items
00069         if (!vlnv_) {
00070 
00071                 // a new item can't yet have children so no need to search for
00072                 // one with a same name
00073                 childItems_.push_back(new LibraryItem(vlnv,
00074                                                 static_cast<Level>(static_cast<int>(level) + 1), this));
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 // The destructor
00079 LibraryItem::~LibraryItem() {
00080         for (int i = 0; i < childItems_.size(); ++i) {
00081                 delete childItems_.at(i);
00082         }
00083         childItems_.clear();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void LibraryItem::createChild(VLNV* vlnv, Level level ) {
00087         QString childName;
00088 
00089         // choose name for the item in the tree
00090         switch (level) {
00091         case ROOT:
00092                 childName = VLNV::type2Print(vlnv->getType());
00093                 break;
00094         case TYPE:
00095                 childName = vlnv->getVendor();
00096                 break;
00097         case VENDOR:
00098                 childName = vlnv->getLibrary();
00099                 break;
00100         case LIBRARY:
00101                 childName = vlnv->getName();
00102                 break;
00103         case NAME:
00104                 childName = vlnv->getVersion();
00105                 break;
00106                 // invalid level
00107         default:
00108                 return;
00109         }
00110 
00111         // if the child to be created is valid then this item must always be valid 
00112         // too. Only if all children are invalid this can be invalid too
00113         if (vlnv->documentIsValid())
00114                 isValid_ = true;
00115 
00116         // find a child with a same name
00117         for (int i = 0; i < childItems_.size(); ++i) {
00118 
00119                 // if a child with the same name is found
00120                 if (childItems_[i]->getName() == childName) {
00121                         childItems_[i]->createChild(vlnv,
00122                                 static_cast<Level>(static_cast<int>(level) + 1));
00123                         return;
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 
00127         // no child with same name was found so create a new child
00128         childItems_.push_back(new LibraryItem(vlnv,
00129                 static_cast<Level>(static_cast<int>(level) +1), this));
00130         
00131         return;
00132 }

00153 int LibraryItem::row() {
00154         if (parentItem_) {
00155                 return parentItem_->childItems_.indexOf(this);
00156         }
00157 
00158         // if parent does not exist then invalid index is returned
00159         return -1;
00160 }

00163         return childItems_.size();

00166 VLNV* LibraryItem::getVLNV() const {
00167         if (level_ != VERSION) {
00168                 return 0;
00169         }
00170         return vlnv_;

00178         return parentItem_->getIndexOf(this);

00181 bool LibraryItem::hasChildren() const {
00182         return (childItems_.size() != 0);

00185 void LibraryItem::getVLNVs( QList<VLNV*>& vlnvList ) {
00186         
00187         // if this is a leaf-object
00188         if (vlnv_)
00189                 vlnvList.append(vlnv_);
00190 
00191         // if this item has child-items but no vlnv itself
00192         else {
00193                 for (int i = 0; i < childItems_.size(); ++i) {
00194                         childItems_.value(i)->getVLNVs(vlnvList);
00195                 }
00196         }
00197 }

00199 void LibraryItem::removeChild(LibraryItem* childItem ) {
00200 
00201         Q_ASSERT_X(childItem, "LibraryItem::removeChild()",
00202                 "Null LibraryItem-pointer");
00203 
00204         if (childItems_.contains(childItem)) {
00205                 int index = childItems_.indexOf(childItem);
00206 
00207                 delete childItems_.value(index);
00208                 childItems_.removeAt(index);
00209         }
00210 
00211 }

00213 LibraryItem* LibraryItem::findHighestUnique( LibraryItem* childItem ) {
00214         
00215         // if this is the root item
00216         if (!parentItem_)
00217                 return childItem;
00218 
00219         else if (!childItem)
00220                 return parentItem_->findHighestUnique(this);
00221 
00222         // if the childItem is the only child
00223         else if (childItems_.contains(childItem) && childItems_.size() == 1) {
00224                 
00225                 // this is the highest to remove unless parent item is also removed
00226                 return parentItem_->findHighestUnique(this);
00227         }
00228 
00229         return childItem;
00230 }
00231 
00232 LibraryItem* LibraryItem::findHighestUnique( const VLNV* vlnv ) {
00233         
00234         // search all children
00235         for (int i = 0; i < childItems_.size(); ++i) {
00236 
00237                 switch (level_) {
00238 
00239                 case ROOT: {
00240                         if (childItems_.at(i)->getName() == VLNV::type2Print(vlnv->getType())) {
00241                                 return childItems_.at(i)->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00242                         }
00243                         continue;
00244                 case TYPE: {
00245                         if (childItems_.at(i)->getName() == vlnv->getVendor()) {
00246                                 return childItems_.at(i)->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00247                         }
00248                         continue;
00249                                    }
00250                 case VENDOR: {
00251                         if (childItems_.at(i)->getName() == vlnv->getLibrary()) {
00252                                 return childItems_.at(i)->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00253                         }
00254                         continue;
00255                                          }
00256                 case LIBRARY: {
00257                         if (childItems_.at(i)->getName() == vlnv->getName()) {
00258                                 return childItems_.at(i)->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00259                         }
00260                         continue;
00261                                           }
00262                 case NAME: {
00263                         if (childItems_.at(i)->getName() == vlnv->getVersion()) {
00264                                 return childItems_.at(i)->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00265                         }
00266                         continue;
00267                                    }
00268                 case VERSION: {
00269                                 return parentItem_->findHighestUnique(this);
00270                                  }
00271                 }
00272         }
00273         }
00274         // no child items existed so at least this item can be removed
00275         return parentItem_->findHighestUnique(this);
00276 }

00278 bool LibraryItem::isValid() {
00279         
00280         // if this item identifies the vlnv then it specifies the setting directly
00281         if (vlnv_) {
00282                 isValid_ = vlnv_->documentIsValid();
00283                 return isValid_;
00284         }
00285 
00286         return isValid_;
00287 }
00288 
00289 void LibraryItem::setValidity( bool valid ) {
00290         isValid_ = valid;
00291 
00292         // if this item identifies the vlnv then set the setting for vlnv also
00293         if (vlnv_)
00294                 vlnv_->setDocumentValid(valid);
00295 }

00297 LibraryItem* LibraryItem::findItem( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00298         QString searchedChildName;
00299         
00300         // choose name for the item in the tree
00301         switch (level_) {
00302         case ROOT:
00303                 searchedChildName = VLNV::type2Print(vlnv.getType());
00304                 break;
00305         case TYPE:
00306                 searchedChildName = vlnv.getVendor();
00307                 break;
00308         case VENDOR:
00309                 searchedChildName = vlnv.getLibrary();
00310                 break;
00311         case LIBRARY:
00312                 searchedChildName = vlnv.getName();
00313                 break;
00314         case NAME:
00315                 searchedChildName = vlnv.getVersion();
00316                 break;
00317         case VERSION:
00318 
00319                 // if this item represents the specified vlnv
00320                 if (*vlnv_ == vlnv)
00321                         return this;
00322                 
00323                 // if vlnv was not found
00324                 return 0;
00325         
00326         // invalid level
00327         default:
00328                 return 0;
00329         }
00330 
00331         // search all child items
00332         for (int i = 0; i <childItems_.size(); ++i) {
00333 
00334                 // if child item was one that was searched for
00335                 if (childItems_.value(i)->getName() == searchedChildName)
00336                         return childItems_.value(i)->findItem(vlnv);
00337         }
00338 
00339         // if no match was found
00340         return 0;
00341 }
00342 
00343 QString LibraryItem::getTypeStr() const {
00344 
00345         // if this is hierarchy that contains the type
00346         if (level_ == LibraryItem::TYPE)
00347                 return name_;
00348         
00349         // if root is asked for the type it can't tell it
00350         else if (level_ == LibraryItem::ROOT)
00351                 return QString();
00352 
00353         // ask parent to tell the type
00354         else
00355                 return parentItem_->getTypeStr();
00356 }

00358 void LibraryItem::setVlnv( VLNV& vlnv ) {
00359 
00360         switch (level_) {
00361                 case LibraryItem::ROOT: {
00362                         return;
00363                                                                 }
00364                 case LibraryItem::TYPE: {
00365                         vlnv.setType(name_);
00366                         return;
00367                                                                 }
00368                 case LibraryItem::VENDOR: {
00369                         vlnv.setVendor(name_);
00370                         parentItem_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00371                         return;
00372                                                                   }
00373                 case LibraryItem::LIBRARY: {
00374                         vlnv.setLibrary(name_);
00375                         parentItem_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00376                         return;
00377                                                                    }
00378                 case LibraryItem::NAME: {
00379                         vlnv.setName(name_);
00380                         parentItem_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00381                         return;
00382                                                                 }
00383                 case LibraryItem::VERSION: {
00384                         vlnv.setVersion(name_);
00385                         parentItem_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00386                         return;
00387                                                                    }
00388                                                                 
00389         }
00390 }

00392 void LibraryItem::clear() {
00393         qDeleteAll(childItems_);
00394         childItems_.clear();

00397 QList<LibraryItem*> LibraryItem::getVendors( const QRegExpValidator& validator ) const {
00398         QList<LibraryItem*> list;
00399         int pos = 0;
00400 
00401         switch (level_) {
00402                 case LibraryItem::ROOT: {
00403                         foreach (LibraryItem* item, childItems_) {
00404                                 list += item->getVendors(validator);
00405                         }
00406                         break;
00407                                                                 }
00408                 case LibraryItem::TYPE: {
00409                         foreach (LibraryItem* item, childItems_) {
00410 
00411                                 QString name = item->getName();
00412 
00413                                 // if the child's name passes the validation
00414                                 if (QValidator::Acceptable == validator.validate(name, pos))
00415                                         list.append(item);
00416                         }
00417                         break;
00418                                                                 }
00419                 default:
00420                         Q_ASSERT_X(false, "LibraryItem::getVendors",
00421                                 "Switch came to code that should never be executed");
00422                         return list;
00423                         
00424         }
00425         // when items are appended to list return it.
00426         return list;
00427 }
00428 
00429 QList<LibraryItem*> LibraryItem::getVendors() const {
00430         QList<LibraryItem*> list;
00431 
00432         switch (level_) {
00433                 case LibraryItem::ROOT: {
00434                         foreach (LibraryItem* item, childItems_) {
00435                                 list += item->getVendors();
00436                         }
00437                         return list;
00438                                                                 }
00439                 case LibraryItem::TYPE: {
00440                         return childItems_;
00441                                                                 }
00442                 default:
00443                         Q_ASSERT_X(false, "LibraryItem::getVendors",
00444                                 "Switch came to code that should never be executed");
00445                         return list;
00446         }
00447 }

00449 QList<LibraryItem*> LibraryItem::getLibraries( const QRegExpValidator& validator ) const {
00450         QList<LibraryItem*> list;
00451         int pos = 0;
00452 
00453         switch (level_) {
00454                 case LibraryItem::ROOT:
00455                 case LibraryItem::TYPE: {
00456                         foreach (LibraryItem* item, childItems_) {
00457                                 list += item->getLibraries(validator);
00458                         }
00459                         break;
00460                                                                 }
00461                 case LibraryItem::VENDOR: {
00462                         foreach (LibraryItem* item, childItems_) {
00463 
00464                             QString name = item->getName();
00465 
00466                             // if the child's name passes the validation
00467                                 if (QValidator::Acceptable == validator.validate(name, pos))
00468                                         list.append(item);
00469                         }
00470                         break;
00471                                                                   }
00472                 default:
00473                         Q_ASSERT_X(false, "LibraryItem::getVendors",
00474                                 "Switch came to code that should never be executed");
00475                         return list;
00476         }
00477         // when items are appended to list return it.
00478         return list;
